name: GENE_IDENT
description: Version-independent information about a gene record such as its name or HUGO Gene Nomenclature (HGNC) ID.

columns.name: GENE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the gene record.

columns.name: RECORD_SYMBOL
columns.description: The current symbol for this gene. In cases of disagreement, the current HGNC symbol will be used.
